Package suncertify.db.dao

Interface Summary
IContractorDao IContractorDao interface consists of specific Data Access Object methods for Contractor domain object.
IDao<T extends Persistent> IDao interface consists of common Data Access Object methods for CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete).
 

Enum Summary
ComparisonOperator ComparisonOperator is a simple enum class containing comparison operators.
 

Exception Summary
DaoDuplicateException DaoDuplicateException is thrown when user tries to store/update record(s) with not unique data (i.e. record with the same data already exists in database).
DaoException DaoException is thrown when general failure connected with DAO operations occurs and is also base class for all specific exceptions that can occur during DAO proceedings.
DaoFinderException DaoFinderException is thrown when finder/loader methods could not find required objects in the persistent layer.
DaoInitializationException DaoInitializationException is thrown during concrete DAO instantiation process when any kind of failure occurs.
DaoStaleObjectException DaoStaleObjectException is thrown when user wants to perform DAO operation on the stale data (e.g. user wants to update the record no longer exists).
